meanings: [명사] tiredness, exhaustion, fatigue, [형용사] tired, exhausted, weary, worn out, (formal) fatigued, (S) beat
Noun 피론(365?-275? B.C.) ((그리스의 철학자, 회의론(懷疑論)의 시조))

vlive.korean: 내가 이래서 피로회복제 같은 거 따로 안 먹잖아? This is why I don't drink energy drinks. 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 너무 좋아해서 짝사랑만 하는 거 이해됨? [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.04
vlive.english: This is why I don't drink energy drinks.

vlive.korean: 오늘 하루 쌓인 피로가 완전 싸~악 풀리실걸요? It will relieve all the fatigue from a long day. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 내 거잖아요, 이거 (Feat.선글라스) [가두리횟집] EP05
vlive.english: It will relieve all the fatigue from a long day.

vlive.korean: [스케줄이 많은 #소규현 규현만의 피로를 푸는 방법은?] [KYUHYUN is famous for busy schedule and working hard. What's your way to recover from fatigue?] View video SMTOWN : SUPER JUNIOR 슈퍼주니어 #Ask_SUPERJUNIOR Q&A Video
vlive.english: [KYUHYUN is famous for busy schedule and working hard. What's your way to recover from fatigue?]

vlive.korean: [울 씅씅이 이미 내 인생의 피로회복제고 만병통치약이고 행복의 비결인데] 뭘 찾어~? [She's my vitamins and my secret to happiness] Why do you look for such a thing? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [2년 전 오늘의 OH MY GIRL] 울 씅씅에게 빠지면 치료법? 그런게 어딨어요 이미 게임오버💕 (HAPPY SEUNGHEE DAY 2years ago!)
vlive.english: [She's my vitamins and my secret to happiness] Why do you look for such a thing?

vlive.korean: 피로야 가라! Say good bye fatigue! 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#49. 비투비 뮤직쇼! 동전가왕 (w.BTOB)

examples.korean: Tiredness can easily creep up on you while you’re driving. 발음듣기 운전 중에는 피로감의 영향을 받기가[피로가 서서히 몰려오기] 쉽다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Tiredness can easily creep up on you while you’re driving. 발음

examples.korean: Driver fatigue was to blame for the accident. 발음듣기 운전자의 피로가 그 사고를 초래했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Driver fatigue was to blame for the accident. 발음

examples.korean: The patient exhibited signs of fatigue and memory loss. 발음듣기 그 환자는 피로감과 기억력 감퇴를 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The patient exhibited signs of fatigue and memory loss. 발음

examples.korean: physical and mental fatigue 발음듣기 신체적 및 정신적 피로 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Tiredness while driving can kill. 발음듣기 피로 운전은 생명을 앗아갈 수도 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Tiredness while driving can kill. 발음
